Description:
Detects PowerShell scripts to set the ACL to a file in the Windows folder

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell Set-Acl On Windows Folder
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((command like '%-path "c:\windows%' or command like '%-path 'c:\windows%' or command like '%-path %windir%%' or command like '%-path $env:windir%') and (command like '%fullcontrol%' or command like '%allow%') and ((original_file_name = 'powershell.exe' or original_file_name = 'pwsh.dll') and (process_path like '%\powershell.exe' or process_path like '%\pwsh.exe')) and (command like '%set-acl %' and command like '%-aclobject %'))
